name: oneDrum
overview:
oneDrum is a free, lightweight desktop application that can turn any application into a rich, collaborative environment.

The first release of oneDrum is the only platform on the market that takes the compromise out of collaborating in Microsoft Office.

It enables:

*Simultaneous, multi-author document creation and editing in PowerPoint, Excel and Word

  • Effective communication, coordination and control of change

  • Secure, synchronised file sharing and version management.

oneDrum is currently in private beta and is being developed by a team of experienced software engineers based in Stirling, Scotland.
